modifications: Added virtual scrolling for Category Top Locations
Created new type CategoryVirtualItem for discriminated union
Added useVirtualList hook for Category Top Locations

patterns_discovered: Discriminated union for virtualizing list items with different heights
Conditional rendering based on authentication status
Memoized computation of virtual list items
Use of VirtualListContainer for efficient rendering
Separating list generation logic from rendering logic
gotchas_discovered: Need to handle different item types (signup prompt, blurred, ranked) in virtual list
Varying item heights require custom height calculation function
Authentication status impacts list rendering and item generation

key_achievements: Implemented virtual scrolling for Category Top Locations
Maintained existing UI/UX while improving performance
Supported both authenticated and non-authenticated user scenarios

recommendations: Consider extracting virtual list logic into a reusable hook or component
Add performance monitoring to validate virtualization benefits
Document the discriminated union and virtual list implementation for future developers
